func_sig.description: Calculate the ratio of areas and volumes given the dimensions of the original and smaller cones.

area_large_cone.description: The surface area of the large cone.

area_small_cone.description: The surface area of the small cone.

volume_large_cone.description: The volume of the large cone.

volume_small_cone.description: The volume of the small cone.

func_sig.description: Calculate the surface area of a circle given its radius.

func_sig.description: Calculate the volume of a cone given its radius and height.

radius.description: The radius of the base of the cone.

radius_bottom.description: The radius of the bottom base.

radius_top.description: The radius of the top base.

func_sig.description: Calculate the area of a circle given the radius.

func_sig.description: Calculate the area of a triangle given the lengths of its sides using Heron's formula.
func_sig.name: calculate_area_of_triangle

semiperimeter.description: Semi-perimeter of the triangle, calculated as (a + b + c) / 2.
